actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 30 of title 38, United States Code, to allow certain Vietnam-era veterans with a break in service to become eligible for benefits under the new GI bill educational assistance program.

summary.text: Allows certain Vietnam-era veterans with a break in service to become eligible for benefits under the new GI bill educational assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 30 of title 38, United States Code, to allow certain Vietnam-era veterans with a break in service to become eligible for benefits under the new GI bill educational assistance program.
